description: CustomResourceDefinitionSpec describes how a user wants their resource to appear

group.description: Group is the group this resource belongs in

names.description: Names are the names used to describe this custom resource

scope.description: Scope indicates whether this resource is cluster or namespace scoped.  Default is namespaced

subresources.description: Subresources describes the subresources for CustomResources This field is alpha-level and should only be sent to servers that enable subresources via the CustomResourceSubresources feature gate.

validation.description: Validation describes the validation methods for CustomResources

version.description: Version is the version this resource belongs in
